p.k: Express your individuality and embrace your own Kawaii universe! Our hosts Misha and RinRin will guide you to figure out how to let your uniqueness shine.
p.d: In this episode, we feature some exciting people and ideas looking to change the image of a barrier-free society. Some of those ideas include fashion items using art from handicapped artists, and a club event focused on educating while entertaining. In the studio, a wheelchair fashion journalist joins Misha and RinRin, where he shares his love for fashion.
